name: Island Delivery
description:
Deliver packages to level up while fending off enemies!

Pickup packages from the dock and deliver them to the many mailboxes on the island in order to level up your skills.

Developed in 10~ hours for Alakajam #16

Controls:
WASD/Left Stick : Movement
Left Mouse Button / X Button / Square Button : Attack
Right Mouse Button / Y Button / Triangle Button : Alt Attack

Menus will need to be interacted with the Mouse
